failed-precondition: Operation cannot be executed in the current system state.

about_tjhaz_description: Welcome to Tjhaz, your official destination for a unique and professional experience that combines enjoyable sea trips, entertainment activities, and online shopping. At Tjhaz, we are committed to providing innovative and reliable services that meet all your needs in a simple and secure manner, focusing on the highest standards of quality and comfort in all our services.
vision: To be the leading platform in providing marine solutions, entertainment services, and an online shopping experience by offering exceptional experiences that meet the aspirations of all our users in a safe and integrated environment.
boat_rental: We offer you unique opportunities to enjoy unforgettable sea trips. Whether for fishing or leisure, you can rent boats and yachts easily and securely through our app or website.
chalet_rental: Book your perfect chalet in prime locations and enjoy a peaceful and relaxing time in a natural environment, away from daily stress.
camping_and_water_activities: Enjoy desert adventures and exciting water activities suitable for all ages, ensuring the highest levels of safety and comfort during activities.
yacht_dining_services: We offer you a unique dining experience on board yachts, with a variety of luxurious meals to suit different tastes, making every sea trip more special.
online_shopping: Browse a wide range of online stores offering the best products, including marine equipment, swimwear, diving gear, and much more. All available easily through our app or website.
easy_booking: Book your experience easily and quickly through our app available on Android and iOS or via the website, ensuring a smooth and convenient experience.
secure_payment: We offer you multiple secure payment options including K-Net, Visa, and MasterCard, ensuring a comfortable and safe shopping experience.
why_tjhaz: A reliable and advanced platform providing top-tier marine and entertainment services. A fast and user-friendly interface via our app and website www.tajhezapp.com. 24/7 customer support to ensure your satisfaction and comfort. Join us today!
unforgettable_experience_title: Experience an Unforgettable Journey with Tjhaz
unforgettable_experience: Where we offer you the highest levels of service and comfort at every moment.
